item.title: SignalR and Akka.NET on DotNet Core
item.author: mike@bridgecanada.com (Mike Bridge)
item.description: Note: this post is out-of-date—Akka.NET now runs on Dotnet Core Currently there is no DotNet Core runtime support for Akka.NET or SignalR. I was about resign myself to the idea of waiting for another year or so to try them out together in the new environment, but I randomly came across a blog that mentions that you can run non-core libraries on ASP.Net Core â€” if you target .
